title: Verve Jazz Masters 03 - Chick Corea (1994) [Jazz][mp3 160][h33t]
description:
Verve Jazz Masters 03 - Chick Corea
Audio CD: March 22, 1994 
Original Release Date: March 22, 1994 
Label: Polygram Records 
Bitrate: 160 kbps

Not all of the installments in the Verve Jazz Masters series contain material originally issued on Verve.  Verve Jazz Masters 3, for example, consists of 14 examples drawn from seven Chick Corea LPs released on the Polydor label during the years 1972-1978.  Six of these come from Corea's Return to Forever period.  The backbone of this collection (tracks one, seven, ten and fourteen) are selections from the highly acclaimed album Light as a Feather (1972) and there are excerpts from Hymn of the Seventh Galaxy (1973) and No Mystery (1975).  The other eight titles are traceable to Corea's theatrically costumed and somewhat heavy-handed production albums The Leprechaun (1975), My Spanish Heart (1976), Friends (1978 ) and The Mad Hatter (1978 ).  This disc will be useful as a vintage jazz fusion sampler or more specifically as an overview of what Chick Corea was up to during the Nixon/Ford/Carter years. ~ arwulf arwulf, AMG

This album changed my life.  Although it is now out-of-print, this album is worth travelling around the world to find.  I really suggest looking up the (currently) 4 that are left on amazon.  This album features most of Chick's greatest compositions and displays his genius in perfect form.  I first heard this album at my University's library and unable to check it out of the building,  taped it.  I WORE THE TAPE OUT.  You know what ... if you can find this album, LET ME KNOW !! (Don't own a C.C.) This is quite possibly the most wicked collection in all of Jazz Fusion. A MUST FIND AND A MUST BUY. ~ Blazing Arrow 74
